localised_text.last_approved_text: An attacker may win a [[sl:battle_siege_battles]]siege battle[[/sl]] by capturing the central [[sl:battle_victory_points]]victory point[[/sl]].

advice_info_texts.localised_text: An attacker may win a [[sl:battle_siege_battles]]siege battle[[/sl]] by capturing the central [[sl:battle_victory_points]]victory point[[/sl]].

localised_text.last_approved_text: A victory point may be captured by driving the enemy away and positioning [[sl:battle_units]]units[[/sl]] within it.

advice_info_texts.localised_text: A victory point may be captured by driving the enemy away and positioning [[sl:battle_units]]units[[/sl]] within it.

localised_text.last_approved_text: The enemy may counter-attack and interrupt the capture process.

advice_info_texts.localised_text: The enemy may counter-attack and interrupt the capture process.

localised_text.last_approved_text: Move the camera using the W, A, S and D keys.

advice_info_texts.localised_text: Move the camera using the W, A, S and D keys.

localised_text.last_approved_text: Orientate the camera by holding down the middle mouse button.

advice_info_texts.localised_text: Orientate the camera by holding down the middle mouse button.

localised_text.last_approved_text: Change the camera height with the mouse scroll wheel.

advice_info_texts.localised_text: Change the camera height with the mouse scroll wheel.

localised_text.last_approved_text: Hold down shift to move the camera faster.

advice_info_texts.localised_text: Hold down shift to move the camera faster.

localised_text.last_approved_text: Orders on the [[sl:battle_battlefield]]battlefield[[/sl]] are issued to [[sl:battle_units]]units[[/sl]], not individual troops.

advice_info_texts.localised_text: Orders on the [[sl:battle_battlefield]]battlefield[[/sl]] are issued to [[sl:battle_units]]units[[/sl]], not individual troops.

localised_text.last_approved_text: Select a single unit by left-clicking.

advice_info_texts.localised_text: Select a single unit by left-clicking.

localised_text.last_approved_text: Select multiple units by left-clicking and dragging a box around them.

advice_info_texts.localised_text: Select multiple units by left-clicking and dragging a box around them.

localised_text.last_approved_text: Issue a move order to selected units by right-clicking on the [[sl:battle_terrain]]terrain[[/sl]].

advice_info_texts.localised_text: Issue a move order to selected units by right-clicking on the [[sl:battle_terrain]]terrain[[/sl]].

localised_text.last_approved_text: Double-right-click to order selected units to run.

advice_info_texts.localised_text: Double-right-click to order selected units to run.

localised_text.last_approved_text: Previous advice can be recalled with the [[sl_tooltip:battle_advice_history_buttons]]Advice Back buttons[[/sl_tooltip]].

advice_info_texts.localised_text: Previous advice can be recalled with the [[sl_tooltip:battle_advice_history_buttons]]Advice Back buttons[[/sl_tooltip]].

localised_text.last_approved_text: Help pages are available to provide information while the game is running.

advice_info_texts.localised_text: Help pages are available to provide information while the game is running.

localised_text.last_approved_text: Issue an attack order to [[sl:battle_unit_selection]]selected units[[/sl]] by right-clicking an enemy.

advice_info_texts.localised_text: Issue an attack order to [[sl:battle_unit_selection]]selected units[[/sl]] by right-clicking an enemy.

localised_text.last_approved_text: Double-right-click on an enemy to order selected [[sl:battle_units]]units[[/sl]] to charge.

advice_info_texts.localised_text: Double-right-click on an enemy to order selected [[sl:battle_units]]units[[/sl]] to charge.

localised_text.last_approved_text: Soldiers fight best against enemies that are in front of them.

advice_info_texts.localised_text: Soldiers fight best against enemies that are in front of them.

localised_text.last_approved_text: Units will suffer increased casualties when attacked from the sides or rear.

advice_info_texts.localised_text: Units will suffer increased casualties when attacked from the sides or rear.

localised_text.last_approved_text: Double-click on a [[sl:battle_unit_cards]]unit card[[/sl]] to zoom to that [[sl:battle_units]]unit[[/sl]].

advice_info_texts.localised_text: Double-click on a [[sl:battle_unit_cards]]unit card[[/sl]] to zoom to that [[sl:battle_units]]unit[[/sl]].

localised_text.last_approved_text: Select multiple units by clicking their unit cards while holding down Shift or CTRL.

advice_info_texts.localised_text: Select multiple units by clicking their unit cards while holding down Shift or CTRL.

localised_text.last_approved_text: Order selected [[sl:battle_units]]units[[/sl]] to precise positions by right-clicking and dragging out a formation on the [[sl:battle_terrain]]terrain[[/sl]].

advice_info_texts.localised_text: Order selected [[sl:battle_units]]units[[/sl]] to precise positions by right-clicking and dragging out a formation on the [[sl:battle_terrain]]terrain[[/sl]].

localised_text.last_approved_text: Hold the Spacebar to see unit destinations while they move.

advice_info_texts.localised_text: Hold the Spacebar to see unit destinations while they move.

localised_text.last_approved_text: A [[sl:battle_units]]unit[[/sl]] will flee the [[sl:battle_battlefield]]battlefield[[/sl]] when its [[img:icon_morale]][[/img]][[sl:battle_leadership]]leadership level[[/sl]] drops too low, and no longer respond to orders.

advice_info_texts.localised_text: A [[sl:battle_units]]unit[[/sl]] will flee the [[sl:battle_battlefield]]battlefield[[/sl]] when its [[img:icon_morale]][[/img]][[sl:battle_leadership]]leadership level[[/sl]] drops too low, and no longer respond to orders.

localised_text.last_approved_text: A unit's [[img:icon_morale]][[/img]]leadership level and the influencing factors are displayed on its tooltip.

advice_info_texts.localised_text: A unit's [[img:icon_morale]][[/img]]leadership level and the influencing factors are displayed on its tooltip.

localised_text.last_approved_text: Undead [[sl:battle_units]]units[[/sl]] will not flee the battle like living units, but will become unstable when their [[img:icon_morale]][[/img]][[sl:battle_leadership]]leadership level[[/sl]] drops.

advice_info_texts.localised_text: Undead [[sl:battle_units]]units[[/sl]] will not flee the battle like living units, but will become unstable when their [[img:icon_morale]][[/img]][[sl:battle_leadership]]leadership level[[/sl]] drops.

localised_text.last_approved_text: Unstable units are less effective in combat and take even more damage.

advice_info_texts.localised_text: Unstable units are less effective in combat and take even more damage.

localised_text.last_approved_text: Missile troops will automatically fire at any enemy [[sl:battle_units]]units[[/sl]] in range.

advice_info_texts.localised_text: Missile troops will automatically fire at any enemy [[sl:battle_units]]units[[/sl]] in range.

localised_text.last_approved_text: Hover the mouse cursor over a missile unit to display its arc of fire.

advice_info_texts.localised_text: Hover the mouse cursor over a missile unit to display its arc of fire.

localised_text.last_approved_text: Right-click on a wall piece to order a selected [[sl:battle_units]]unit[[/sl]] to climb it.

advice_info_texts.localised_text: Right-click on a wall piece to order a selected [[sl:battle_units]]unit[[/sl]] to climb it.

localised_text.last_approved_text: The [[img:icon_general]][[/img]]Lord is the most important [[sl:battle_units]]unit[[/sl]] in an [[sl:battle_armies]]army[[/sl]] and provides a [[img:icon_morale]][[/img]][[sl:battle_leadership]]leadership[[/sl]] boost to nearby units.

advice_info_texts.localised_text: The [[img:icon_general]][[/img]]Lord is the most important [[sl:battle_units]]unit[[/sl]] in an [[sl:battle_armies]]army[[/sl]] and provides a [[img:icon_morale]][[/img]][[sl:battle_leadership]]leadership[[/sl]] boost to nearby units.

localised_text.last_approved_text: [[img:icon_general]][[/img]]Lords can use powerful [[sl:battle_unit_abilities]]abilities[[/sl]] to empower allied units and turn the tide of battle.

advice_info_texts.localised_text: [[img:icon_general]][[/img]]Lords can use powerful [[sl:battle_unit_abilities]]abilities[[/sl]] to empower allied units and turn the tide of battle.

localised_text.last_approved_text: Mobile soldiers on mounts, ideal for swift manoeuvres.

advice_info_texts.localised_text: Mobile soldiers on mounts, ideal for swift manoeuvres.

localised_text.last_approved_text: A mounted charge can provoke a sudden drop in an enemy's [[img:icon_morale]][[/img]][[sl:battle_leadership]]leadership level[[/sl]], particularly when delivered to the [[sl:battle_flanking]]flank[[/sl]] or rear of a [[sl:battle_units]]unit[[/sl]].

advice_info_texts.localised_text: A mounted charge can provoke a sudden drop in an enemy's [[img:icon_morale]][[/img]][[sl:battle_leadership]]leadership level[[/sl]], particularly when delivered to the [[sl:battle_flanking]]flank[[/sl]] or rear of a [[sl:battle_units]]unit[[/sl]].

localised_text.last_approved_text: Vulnerable against [[sl:battle_weapon_types]]spear weapons[[/sl]], and in prolonged engagements.

advice_info_texts.localised_text: Vulnerable against [[sl:battle_weapon_types]]spear weapons[[/sl]], and in prolonged engagements.

localised_text.last_approved_text: A battle is won when all [[sl:battle_units]]units[[/sl]] on one side are routed or killed.

advice_info_texts.localised_text: A battle is won when all [[sl:battle_units]]units[[/sl]] on one side are routed or killed.

localised_text.last_approved_text: A [[sl:battle_siege_battles]]siege battle[[/sl]] can also be won by capturing the central [[sl:battle_victory_points]]victory point[[/sl]].

advice_info_texts.localised_text: A [[sl:battle_siege_battles]]siege battle[[/sl]] can also be won by capturing the central [[sl:battle_victory_points]]victory point[[/sl]].

localised_text.last_approved_text: [[sl:battle_wizards]]Wizards[[/sl]] can cast powerful spells in battle, either to aid allied troops or attack the enemy.

advice_info_texts.localised_text: [[sl:battle_wizards]]Wizards[[/sl]] can cast powerful spells in battle, either to aid allied troops or attack the enemy.

localised_text.last_approved_text: Available spells are shown on the [[sl:battle_winds_of_magic]]Winds of Magic[[/sl]] panel when the wizard [[sl:battle_units]]unit[[/sl]] is selected.

advice_info_texts.localised_text: Available spells are shown on the [[sl:battle_winds_of_magic]]Winds of Magic[[/sl]] panel when the wizard [[sl:battle_units]]unit[[/sl]] is selected.

localised_text.last_approved_text: Casting spells depletes the available Winds of Magic, which recharges over time.

advice_info_texts.localised_text: Casting spells depletes the available Winds of Magic, which recharges over time.

localised_text.last_approved_text: Corruption is a measure of [[img:icon_corruption_chs]][[/img]][[sl:campaign_chaos]]Chaos[[/sl]] or [[img:icon_corruption_vmp]][[/img]][[sl:campaign_vampires]]Vampiric[[/sl]] influence in a [[sl:campaign_provinces]]province[[/sl]], and is shown on the [[sl:campaign_province_info_panel]]Province Info panel[[/sl]]. Insufficient [[img:icon_corruption_vmp]][[/img]]Vampiric corruption in a province can lead to [[sl:campaign_public_order]]unrest[[/sl]] and [[img:icon_attrition]][[/img]][[sl:campaign_attrition]]attrition[[/sl]].

advice_info_texts.localised_text: Corruption is a measure of [[img:icon_corruption_chs]][[/img]][[sl:campaign_chaos]]Chaos[[/sl]] or [[img:icon_corruption_vmp]][[/img]][[sl:campaign_vampires]]Vampiric[[/sl]] influence in a [[sl:campaign_provinces]]province[[/sl]], and is shown on the [[sl:campaign_province_info_panel]]Province Info panel[[/sl]]. localised_text.last_approved_text: Factions are tribes, peoples or nations on the [[sl:campaign_campaign_map]]campaign map[[/sl]] that control [[sl:campaign_settlements]]settlements[[/sl]] and amass [[sl:campaign_armies]]armies[[/sl]].

advice_info_texts.localised_text: Factions are tribes, peoples or nations on the [[sl:campaign_campaign_map]]campaign map[[/sl]] that control [[sl:campaign_settlements]]settlements[[/sl]] and amass [[sl:campaign_armies]]armies[[/sl]].

localised_text.last_approved_text: A faction is destroyed when it controls no more armies or settlements.

advice_info_texts.localised_text: A faction is destroyed when it controls no more armies or settlements.

localised_text.last_approved_text: The campaign map is the theatre in which [[sl:campaign_armies]]armies[[/sl]] and [[sl:campaign_factions]]factions[[/sl]] can be created, surveyed, commanded and destroyed.

advice_info_texts.localised_text: The campaign map is the theatre in which [[sl:campaign_armies]]armies[[/sl]] and [[sl:campaign_factions]]factions[[/sl]] can be created, surveyed, commanded and destroyed.

localised_text.last_approved_text: Territory on the map is divided into [[sl:campaign_provinces]]provinces[[/sl]]. Each province contains multiple [[sl:campaign_settlements]]settlements[[/sl]].

advice_info_texts.localised_text: Territory on the map is divided into [[sl:campaign_provinces]]provinces[[/sl]]. Each province contains multiple [[sl:campaign_settlements]]settlements[[/sl]].

localised_text.last_approved_text: [[sl:campaign_buildings]]Buildings[[/sl]] within a [[sl:campaign_settlements]]settlement[[/sl]] can be browsed, constructed, repaired, and dismantled from the [[sl:campaign_province_overview_panel]]Province Overview panel[[/sl]].

advice_info_texts.localised_text: [[sl:campaign_buildings]]Buildings[[/sl]] within a [[sl:campaign_settlements]]settlement[[/sl]] can be browsed, constructed, repaired, and dismantled from the [[sl:campaign_province_overview_panel]]Province Overview panel[[/sl]].

localised_text.last_approved_text: A building's rollout panel is shown when the mouse cursor is placed over the building icon.

advice_info_texts.localised_text: A building's rollout panel is shown when the mouse cursor is placed over the building icon.

localised_text.last_approved_text: Building upgrades can be browsed and initiated from a building's rollout panel.

advice_info_texts.localised_text: Building upgrades can be browsed and initiated from a building's rollout panel.

localised_text.last_approved_text: Time on the campaign map is advanced in [[sl:campaign_turns]]turns[[/sl]].

advice_info_texts.localised_text: Time on the campaign map is advanced in [[sl:campaign_turns]]turns[[/sl]].

localised_text.last_approved_text: Use the [[sl_tooltip:campaign_end_turn_button]]End Turn button[[/sl_tooltip]] to move the game on. Other [[sl:campaign_factions]]factions[[/sl]] will then get a turn to move their [[sl:campaign_armies]]armies[[/sl]], [[sl:campaign_unit_recruitment]]recruit units[[/sl]] and perform other actions.

advice_info_texts.localised_text: Use the [[sl_tooltip:campaign_end_turn_button]]End Turn button[[/sl_tooltip]] to move the game on. Other [[sl:campaign_factions]]factions[[/sl]] will then get a turn to move their [[sl:campaign_armies]]armies[[/sl]], [[sl:campaign_unit_recruitment]]recruit units[[/sl]] and perform other actions.

localised_text.last_approved_text: Armies are used to attack and defend [[sl:campaign_settlements]]settlements[[/sl]] and fight enemy armies.

advice_info_texts.localised_text: Armies are used to attack and defend [[sl:campaign_settlements]]settlements[[/sl]] and fight enemy armies.

localised_text.last_approved_text: An army is always led by a [[sl:campaign_lords]]Lord[[/sl]].

advice_info_texts.localised_text: An army is always led by a [[sl:campaign_lords]]Lord[[/sl]].

localised_text.last_approved_text: An army can be selected by left-clicking on it.

advice_info_texts.localised_text: An army can be selected by left-clicking on it.

localised_text.last_approved_text: Selected armies can be moved to a location by right-clicking there.

advice_info_texts.localised_text: Selected armies can be moved to a location by right-clicking there.

localised_text.last_approved_text: [[sl:campaign_settlements]]Settlements[[/sl]] contain [[sl:campaign_buildings]]buildings[[/sl]] that provide a variety of benefits.

advice_info_texts.localised_text: [[sl:campaign_settlements]]Settlements[[/sl]] contain [[sl:campaign_buildings]]buildings[[/sl]] that provide a variety of benefits.

localised_text.last_approved_text: Settlements and buildings are managed from the [[sl:campaign_province_overview_panel]]Province Overview panel[[/sl]], which appears when a settlement is selected.

advice_info_texts.localised_text: Settlements and buildings are managed from the [[sl:campaign_province_overview_panel]]Province Overview panel[[/sl]], which appears when a settlement is selected.

localised_text.last_approved_text: The Province Overview panel shows all settlements within the selected [[sl:campaign_provinces]]province[[/sl]], as well as buildings within settlements under control.

advice_info_texts.localised_text: The Province Overview panel shows all settlements within the selected [[sl:campaign_provinces]]province[[/sl]], as well as buildings within settlements under control.

localised_text.last_approved_text: Additional [[sl:campaign_units]]units[[/sl]] can be recruited into a selected [[sl:campaign_armies]]army[[/sl]] from the [[sl:campaign_unit_recruitment_panel]]Recruitment panel[[/sl]], which is opened from the [[sl:campaign_army_panel]]Army panel[[/sl]].

advice_info_texts.localised_text: Additional [[sl:campaign_units]]units[[/sl]] can be recruited into a selected [[sl:campaign_armies]]army[[/sl]] from the [[sl:campaign_unit_recruitment_panel]]Recruitment panel[[/sl]], which is opened from the [[sl:campaign_army_panel]]Army panel[[/sl]].

localised_text.last_approved_text: Left-click on a [[sl:campaign_unit_cards]]unit card[[/sl]] on the Recruitment panel to add it to the recruitment queue.

advice_info_texts.localised_text: Left-click on a [[sl:campaign_unit_cards]]unit card[[/sl]] on the Recruitment panel to add it to the recruitment queue.

localised_text.last_approved_text: The cost of recruiting each unit is shown on its unit card and is subtracted from the {{tr:icon_treasury}}[[sl_tooltip:campaign_treasury]]treasury[[/sl_tooltip]].

advice_info_texts.localised_text: The cost of recruiting each unit is shown on its unit card and is subtracted from the {{tr:icon_treasury}}[[sl_tooltip:campaign_treasury]]treasury[[/sl_tooltip]].

localised_text.last_approved_text: Researching new technologies can bring a variety of military and civic benefits.

advice_info_texts.localised_text: Researching new technologies can bring a variety of military and civic benefits.

localised_text.last_approved_text: Only one technology may be researched at a time.

advice_info_texts.localised_text: Only one technology may be researched at a time.

localised_text.last_approved_text: Research is undertaken on the [[sl:campaign_technology_panel]]Technology panel[[/sl]].

advice_info_texts.localised_text: Research is undertaken on the [[sl:campaign_technology_panel]]Technology panel[[/sl]].

localised_text.last_approved_text: Greenskin factions can research [[sl:campaign_technology]]technologies[[/sl]] from the [[sl:campaign_technology_panel]]Technology panel[[/sl]] once a Goblin Workshop [[sl:campaign_buildings]]building[[/sl]] is constructed.

advice_info_texts.localised_text: Greenskin factions can research [[sl:campaign_technology]]technologies[[/sl]] from the [[sl:campaign_technology_panel]]Technology panel[[/sl]] once a Goblin Workshop [[sl:campaign_buildings]]building[[/sl]] is constructed.

localised_text.last_approved_text: Orders in battle are issued to units, not individual troops.

advice_info_texts.localised_text: Orders in battle are issued to units, not individual troops.

localised_text.last_approved_text: Hills and other terrain features can obscure visibility, allowing units to hide from their enemy’s line of sight.

advice_info_texts.localised_text: Hills and other terrain features can obscure visibility, allowing units to hide from their enemy’s line of sight.

localised_text.last_approved_text: Each army is led by a [[img:icon_general]][[/img]]Lord, who leads and encourages the troops in battle.

advice_info_texts.localised_text: Each army is led by a [[img:icon_general]][[/img]]Lord, who leads and encourages the troops in battle.

localised_text.last_approved_text: The [[img:icon_general]][[/img]]Lord appears in battle as a single-person unit.

advice_info_texts.localised_text: The [[img:icon_general]][[/img]]Lord appears in battle as a single-person unit.

localised_text.last_approved_text: [[img:icon_general]][[/img]]Lords provide a [[img:icon_morale]][[/img]][[sl:battle_leadership]]leadership[[/sl]] boost to nearby troops, improving their courage in battle.

advice_info_texts.localised_text: [[img:icon_general]][[/img]]Lords provide a [[img:icon_morale]][[/img]][[sl:battle_leadership]]leadership[[/sl]] boost to nearby troops, improving their courage in battle.

localised_text.last_approved_text: The area of a [[img:icon_general]][[/img]]Lord's [[img:icon_morale]][[/img]]leadership boost is shown as a blue circle when the cursor is placed over them.

advice_info_texts.localised_text: The area of a [[img:icon_general]][[/img]]Lord's [[img:icon_morale]][[/img]]leadership boost is shown as a blue circle when the cursor is placed over them.

localised_text.last_approved_text: Select multiple units by left-clicking and dragging a box around them.

advice_info_texts.localised_text: Select multiple units by left-clicking and dragging a box around them.

localised_text.last_approved_text: Units may also be selected by left-clicking their [[sl:battle_unit_cards]]Unit cards[[/sl]].

advice_info_texts.localised_text: Units may also be selected by left-clicking their [[sl:battle_unit_cards]]Unit cards[[/sl]].

localised_text.last_approved_text: Hold CTRL while clicking to add units to the current selection.

advice_info_texts.localised_text: Hold CTRL while clicking to add units to the current selection.

localised_text.last_approved_text: Issue a move order to selected [[sl:battle_units]]units[[/sl]] by right-clicking on the [[sl:battle_terrain]]terrain[[/sl]].

advice_info_texts.localised_text: Issue a move order to selected [[sl:battle_units]]units[[/sl]] by right-clicking on the [[sl:battle_terrain]]terrain[[/sl]].

localised_text.last_approved_text: Hold the spacebar to see [[sl:battle_units]]unit[[/sl]] destinations when moving.

advice_info_texts.localised_text: Hold the spacebar to see [[sl:battle_units]]unit[[/sl]] destinations when moving.

localised_text.last_approved_text: Right-click and drag on the [[sl:battle_terrain]]terrain[[/sl]] to order selected units into precise positions.

advice_info_texts.localised_text: Right-click and drag on the [[sl:battle_terrain]]terrain[[/sl]] to order selected units into precise positions.

localised_text.last_approved_text: Press Backspace to halt selected units.

advice_info_texts.localised_text: Press Backspace to halt selected units.

localised_text.last_approved_text: Issue an attack order to selected [[sl:battle_units]]units[[/sl]] by right-clicking an enemy.

advice_info_texts.localised_text: Issue an attack order to selected [[sl:battle_units]]units[[/sl]] by right-clicking an enemy.

localised_text.last_approved_text: Place the mouse cursor over a [[sl:battle_units]]unit[[/sl]] or [[sl:battle_unit_cards]]Unit card[[/sl]] to show information about that unit on its tooltip.

advice_info_texts.localised_text: Place the mouse cursor over a [[sl:battle_units]]unit[[/sl]] or [[sl:battle_unit_cards]]Unit card[[/sl]] to show information about that unit on its tooltip.

localised_text.last_approved_text: The remaining [[img:icon_hp]][[/img]]health of a unit is indicated on a unit's tooltip or Unit card.

advice_info_texts.localised_text: The remaining [[img:icon_hp]][[/img]]health of a unit is indicated on a unit's tooltip or Unit card.

localised_text.last_approved_text: A unit's [[img:icon_morale]][[/img]]leadership level is a measure of its will to continue fighting, and will drop as it takes casualties.

advice_info_texts.localised_text: A unit's [[img:icon_morale]][[/img]]leadership level is a measure of its will to continue fighting, and will drop as it takes casualties.

localised_text.last_approved_text: A unit will flee the battlefield when its [[img:icon_morale]][[/img]]leadership level drops too low, and will no longer respond to orders.

advice_info_texts.localised_text: A unit will flee the battlefield when its [[img:icon_morale]][[/img]]leadership level drops too low, and will no longer respond to orders.

localised_text.last_approved_text: Any factors influencing a unit's [[img:icon_morale]][[/img]]leadership level are shown on its tooltip.

advice_info_texts.localised_text: Any factors influencing a unit's [[img:icon_morale]][[/img]]leadership level are shown on its tooltip.

localised_text.last_approved_text: Units with the high ground enjoy a significant advantage when fighting on sloped terrain.

advice_info_texts.localised_text: Units with the high ground enjoy a significant advantage when fighting on sloped terrain.

localised_text.last_approved_text: Missile units are best employed to stand back from the action and fire, sling or hurl projectiles at the enemy.

advice_info_texts.localised_text: Missile units are best employed to stand back from the action and fire, sling or hurl projectiles at the enemy.

localised_text.last_approved_text: Missile units are generally lightly-armoured and weak in hand-to-hand combat.

advice_info_texts.localised_text: Missile units are generally lightly-armoured and weak in hand-to-hand combat.

localised_text.last_approved_text: An arc of fire is displayed when the cursor is placed over a [[sl:battle_missile_units]]missile unit[[/sl]].

advice_info_texts.localised_text: An arc of fire is displayed when the cursor is placed over a [[sl:battle_missile_units]]missile unit[[/sl]].

localised_text.last_approved_text: Missile units will automatically fire at enemies within their arc of fire, unless instructed otherwise.

advice_info_texts.localised_text: Missile units will automatically fire at enemies within their arc of fire, unless instructed otherwise.

localised_text.last_approved_text: A [[sl:battle_units]]unit[[/sl]] will suffer a penalty to its [[img:icon_morale]][[/img]][[sl:battle_leadership]]leadership level[[/sl]], and may suffer increased casualties, when attacked in the [[sl:battle_flanking]]sides or the rear[[/sl]].

advice_info_texts.localised_text: A [[sl:battle_units]]unit[[/sl]] will suffer a penalty to its [[img:icon_morale]][[/img]][[sl:battle_leadership]]leadership level[[/sl]], and may suffer increased casualties, when attacked in the [[sl:battle_flanking]]sides or the rear[[/sl]].

localised_text.last_approved_text: Arranging troops in a line will minimise opportunities for enemies to surround them.

advice_info_texts.localised_text: Arranging troops in a line will minimise opportunities for enemies to surround them.

localised_text.last_approved_text: Select your [[img:icon_general]][[/img]]Lord in order to be able to browse and activate his [[sl:battle_unit_abilities]]abilities[[/sl]].

advice_info_texts.localised_text: Select your [[img:icon_general]][[/img]]Lord in order to be able to browse and activate his [[sl:battle_unit_abilities]]abilities[[/sl]].

localised_text.last_approved_text: A selected unit's abilities are shown around the [[sl:battle_unit_portrait_panel]]Unit Portrait panel[[/sl]].

advice_info_texts.localised_text: A selected unit's abilities are shown around the [[sl:battle_unit_portrait_panel]]Unit Portrait panel[[/sl]].

localised_text.last_approved_text: Mounted troops ride into battle on mounts, making them ideal for swift manoeuvres.

advice_info_texts.localised_text: Mounted troops ride into battle on mounts, making them ideal for swift manoeuvres.

localised_text.last_approved_text: A mounted charge can provoke a sudden drop in an enemy's [[img:icon_morale]][[/img]][[sl:battle_leadership]]leadership level[[/sl]], particularly when delivered to the [[sl:battle_flanking]]flank or rear[[/sl]] of a unit.

advice_info_texts.localised_text: A mounted charge can provoke a sudden drop in an enemy's [[img:icon_morale]][[/img]][[sl:battle_leadership]]leadership level[[/sl]], particularly when delivered to the [[sl:battle_flanking]]flank or rear[[/sl]] of a unit.

localised_text.last_approved_text: Mounted units are vulnerable against [[sl:battle_weapon_types]]spear weapons[[/sl]], and in prolonged engagements.

advice_info_texts.localised_text: Mounted units are vulnerable against [[sl:battle_weapon_types]]spear weapons[[/sl]], and in prolonged engagements.

localised_text.last_approved_text: Soldiers fight best against enemies that are in front of them.

advice_info_texts.localised_text: Soldiers fight best against enemies that are in front of them.

localised_text.last_approved_text: A unit will suffer a penalty to its [[img:icon_morale]][[/img]][[sl:battle_leadership]]leadership level[[/sl]], and may suffer increased casualties, when attacked in the sides or the rear.

advice_info_texts.localised_text: A unit will suffer a penalty to its [[img:icon_morale]][[/img]][[sl:battle_leadership]]leadership level[[/sl]], and may suffer increased casualties, when attacked in the sides or the rear.

localised_text.last_approved_text: Move with the W, A, S and D keys.

advice_info_texts.localised_text: Move with the W, A, S and D keys.

localised_text.last_approved_text: Drag the middle mouse-button to change facing.

advice_info_texts.localised_text: Drag the middle mouse-button to change facing.

localised_text.last_approved_text: Change height by scrolling the middle mouse-button.

advice_info_texts.localised_text: Change height by scrolling the middle mouse-button.

localised_text.last_approved_text: [[sl:battle_units]]Units[[/sl]] may be arranged for the coming fight during the deployment phase of the [[sl:battle_battle_game]]battle[[/sl]]. Once deployment is completed the battle begins.

advice_info_texts.localised_text: [[sl:battle_units]]Units[[/sl]] may be arranged for the coming fight during the deployment phase of the [[sl:battle_battle_game]]battle[[/sl]]. Once deployment is completed the battle begins.

localised_text.last_approved_text: Units may be positioned within the designated deployment zone.

advice_info_texts.localised_text: Units may be positioned within the designated deployment zone.

localised_text.last_approved_text: A battle will automatically be won by the defender if the time limit expires.

advice_info_texts.localised_text: A battle will automatically be won by the defender if the time limit expires.

localised_text.last_approved_text: The attacker must attack and defeat the defender within the time limit to achieve victory.

advice_info_texts.localised_text: The attacker must attack and defeat the defender within the time limit to achieve victory.

localised_text.last_approved_text: Most [[sl:battle_unit_types]]troop-types[[/sl]] can be hidden in forests.

advice_info_texts.localised_text: Most [[sl:battle_unit_types]]troop-types[[/sl]] can be hidden in forests.

localised_text.last_approved_text: Each unit's [[sl:battle_visibility]]visibility[[/sl]] status is indicated on its [[sl:battle_unit_cards]]Unit card[[/sl]].

advice_info_texts.localised_text: Each unit's [[sl:battle_visibility]]visibility[[/sl]] status is indicated on its [[sl:battle_unit_cards]]Unit card[[/sl]].

localised_text.last_approved_text: Each [[sl:battle_units]]unit[[/sl]] in the player’s [[sl:battle_armies]]army[[/sl]] is represented on the [[sl:battle_battle_interface]]battle interface[[/sl]] by a Unit card. These are shown on the [[sl:battle_army_panel]]Army panel[[/sl]].

advice_info_texts.localised_text: Each [[sl:battle_units]]unit[[/sl]] in the player’s [[sl:battle_armies]]army[[/sl]] is represented on the [[sl:battle_battle_interface]]battle interface[[/sl]] by a Unit card. These are shown on the [[sl:battle_army_panel]]Army panel[[/sl]].

localised_text.last_approved_text: Information about the status of a unit is shown on its Unit card.

advice_info_texts.localised_text: Information about the status of a unit is shown on its Unit card.

localised_text.last_approved_text: Double-left-click on a Unit card to zoom the camera to the associated unit.

advice_info_texts.localised_text: Double-left-click on a Unit card to zoom the camera to the associated unit.

localised_text.last_approved_text: [[sl:battle_infantry]]Infantry[[/sl]] are best arranged in a wide battle line to engage and pin the main body of the enemy.

advice_info_texts.localised_text: [[sl:battle_infantry]]Infantry[[/sl]] are best arranged in a wide battle line to engage and pin the main body of the enemy.

localised_text.last_approved_text: [[sl:battle_missile_units]]Missile troops[[/sl]] are best used to harass and weaken the enemy prior to engagement.

advice_info_texts.localised_text: [[sl:battle_missile_units]]Missile troops[[/sl]] are best used to harass and weaken the enemy prior to engagement.

localised_text.last_approved_text: [[sl:battle_mounted_units]]Mounted troops[[/sl]] are mostly used to [[sl:battle_flanking]]attack the sides and rear[[/sl]] of the enemy once fighting has commenced.

advice_info_texts.localised_text: [[sl:battle_mounted_units]]Mounted troops[[/sl]] are mostly used to [[sl:battle_flanking]]attack the sides and rear[[/sl]] of the enemy once fighting has commenced.

localised_text.last_approved_text: A [[sl:campaign_factions]]faction[[/sl]] is destroyed when it controls no more [[sl:campaign_armies]]armies[[/sl]] or [[sl:campaign_settlements]]settlements[[/sl]].

localised_text.last_approved_text: The campaign map is the main [[sl:campaign_campaign_game]]game[[/sl]] theatre, in which [[sl:campaign_armies]]armies[[/sl]] and [[sl:campaign_factions]]factions[[/sl]] are created, commanded and destroyed.

advice_info_texts.localised_text: The campaign map is the main [[sl:campaign_campaign_game]]game[[/sl]] theatre, in which [[sl:campaign_armies]]armies[[/sl]] and [[sl:campaign_factions]]factions[[/sl]] are created, commanded and destroyed.

localised_text.last_approved_text: Territory on the map is divided into [[sl:campaign_provinces]]provinces[[/sl]]. Each province contains multiple [[sl:campaign_settlements]]settlements[[/sl]].

advice_info_texts.localised_text: Information about a province may be viewed by selecting any of the settlements in the province.

localised_text.last_approved_text: Buildings and construction options within controlled [[sl:campaign_settlements]]settlements[[/sl]] are shown on the [[sl:campaign_province_overview_panel]]Province Overview Panel[[/sl]].

advice_info_texts.localised_text: Buildings and construction options within controlled [[sl:campaign_settlements]]settlements[[/sl]] are shown on the [[sl:campaign_province_overview_panel]]Province Overview Panel[[/sl]].

localised_text.last_approved_text: A building may be upgraded, repaired or dismantled from the rollout panel that appears when the mouse cursor is placed over its building icon.

advice_info_texts.localised_text: A building may be upgraded, repaired or dismantled from the rollout panel that appears when the mouse cursor is placed over its building icon.

localised_text.last_approved_text: Building construction is completed over multiple [[sl:campaign_turns]]turns[[/sl]].

advice_info_texts.localised_text: Building construction is completed over multiple [[sl:campaign_turns]]turns[[/sl]].

localised_text.last_approved_text: Researching new technologies can bring a variety of military and civic benefits.

advice_info_texts.localised_text: Researching new technologies can bring a variety of military and civic benefits.

localised_text.last_approved_text: Research is undertaken on the [[sl:campaign_technology_panel]]Technology panel[[/sl]].

advice_info_texts.localised_text: Research is undertaken on the [[sl:campaign_technology_panel]]Technology panel[[/sl]].

localised_text.last_approved_text: Only one technology may be researched at a time.

advice_info_texts.localised_text: Only one technology may be researched at a time.

localised_text.last_approved_text: Time on the [[sl:campaign_campaign_map]]campaign map[[/sl]] is advanced in turns.

advice_info_texts.localised_text: Time on the [[sl:campaign_campaign_map]]campaign map[[/sl]] is advanced in turns.

localised_text.last_approved_text: Use the [[sl:campaign_end_turn_button]]End Turn button[[/sl]] to move the game on. Other [[sl:campaign_factions]]factions[[/sl]] will then get a turn to move their [[sl:campaign_armies]]armies[[/sl]], [[sl:campaign_unit_recruitment]]recruit units[[/sl]], and perform other actions.

advice_info_texts.localised_text: Use the [[sl:campaign_end_turn_button]]End Turn button[[/sl]] to move the game on. Other [[sl:campaign_factions]]factions[[/sl]] will then get a turn to move their [[sl:campaign_armies]]armies[[/sl]], [[sl:campaign_unit_recruitment]]recruit units[[/sl]], and perform other actions.
